description:
The first times we used Fuckzilla we weren't able to make him do whole lot - it's not easy to make him move while trying to snap pictures and making sure the machines don't impale the ladies. This was the third time, and by now we had the hang of it, but unfortunately we broke it, so haven't shot with it for a while now - finally got it fixed and will start shooting with him soon.
Jade is fabulous as usual, how can you go wrong with her. She literally swallows up some big toys ... how deep can you go ...
title: Jade Marxxx
